title: SportScore
author: SportScore
created_time: August 28, 2023, 07:08:21 AMLast edit: February 28, 2024, 04:20:51 AM by SportScore

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: SportScore on August 28, 2023, 07:10:44 AMWe are working on Smart Contract sport booking for Ethereum/Bitcoin for instant bets + real time watch of the match! all these new features will be announced soon!and you all are welcome to the First! Blockchain Sport booking!Welcome on board Bitcointalk it's always exciting to see new projects popping up,  this time blockchain-based sports live analytics on clubs player stats and soon a sportsbook feature if implemented as mentioned in the op, a platform with a real-time watch of the match nice feature,  but then hope you will have a welcome bonus because the welcome bonus is one of the major ways to attract real-time speaker who may be interested to bet on one or two of those sports games on your soon to be sportsbook, hope to see you around and fixing an eye and I am sure that, other users may also want to try out your sports bets and give their honest review about the platform.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: SportScore on August 28, 2023, 07:10:44 AMand you all are welcome to the First! Blockchain Sport booking!I think this is the 2nd project I have seen, not the first. Few years ago there was another one, I can not remember the name though. By the way, welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: It is nice to see you here, soccer bettors will definitely like it but coming up is not all that is important. What is more important is how reputable this can be, if you have a pilot phase for users to review or to check on reviews done on your website. We have had some scam project here and people are careful to sign up to new startups. But of course it will be nice to check your analysis and perhaps predictions to support our analysis.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Welcome to the forum SportScore.io!To be honest the UX is really bad because I can't sort the league based on my own or searching the specific league I wanted to bet, so someone who want to bet need to scroll down to find the league based on A to Z.I checked the odds, the odds in your sportsbook is smaller than the other bookie, you need to create something big if you want to compete against the current big casinos.

comments.author: SportScore
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on August 28, 2023, 08:10:29 AMWelcome to the forum SportScore.io!To be honest the UX is really bad because I can't sort the league based on my own or searching the specific league I wanted to bet, so someone who want to bet need to scroll down to find the league based on A to Z.I checked the odds, the odds in your sportsbook is smaller than the other bookie, you need to create something big if you want to compete against the current big casinos.Hello thank for the comment, a search feature will be up next update.We push updates every week, once our sport booking feature is up we will have bound and welcome gifts and more to come! Stay tuned

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on August 28, 2023, 07:45:06 AMQuote from: SportScore on August 28, 2023, 07:10:44 AMand you all are welcome to the First! Blockchain Sport booking!I think this is the 2nd project I have seen, not the first. Few years ago there was another one, I can not remember the name though. By the way, welcome to the forum.Hey, Rose may have forgotten to mention that he is one of the reputable campaigns and another promotional marketing manager here in the forum,  and if SportScore needs to expose their platform through any of the offer-mentioned means of promotion. @SportScore you can contact Rose if you want to have a review campaign which is the best for of promotion for you when you eventually launch your sportbooking feature,  because having a review campaign will allow you have real time testers of your platforms there after give their reviews and suggestions on the features and operation of the site.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: SportScore on August 28, 2023, 08:22:38 AMQuote from: Jawhead999 on August 28, 2023, 08:10:29 AMWelcome to the forum SportScore.io!To be honest the UX is really bad because I can't sort the league based on my own or searching the specific league I wanted to bet, so someone who want to bet need to scroll down to find the league based on A to Z.I checked the odds, the odds in your sportsbook is smaller than the other bookie, you need to create something big if you want to compete against the current big casinos.Hello thank for the comment, a search feature will be up next update.We push updates every week, once our sport booking feature is up we will have bound and welcome gifts and more to come! Stay tunedAnd additional sports as well. What is your next in line after football?Also, add FAQ tab so we know what this site is for and other features that you may want to offer in the future.For now, you may be offering a unique aspect of sports. Let us see if bettors here will try to use your services once up and running.You have a lot to launch on our site, but so long you are adding more features as well as listening some of the valid suggestions, you can get some loyal patrons from this forum. So good luck in your journey here.

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! This is interesting, especially for someone like me who's into sports betting. Having live and up-to-date information is crucial for analyzing games and making predictions. I plan to explore the website further to learn more about the services you offer. It seems like a comprehensive resource for sports bettors, providing all the necessary information in one place.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I must say that your design is slick, and that includes your Ann design.How fast do you update your live stats? Because the rate at which you update your live scores will also contribute to how much people would want to use your site. I normally use livescore.in to check stats of a match and and also to check live scores but I don’t mind scraping off that one to use your own, I’m not really in now for sport betting so I don’t really need the odd feature for now but I could utilise for scores and analytics.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I had to check the website for myself after reading through and it looks like more work need be done as what I see here does not rhyme with what you have on your website but however, I like the fact that I see live scores and I believe they are constantly and accurately updated when ever there is changes. I noticed too  you do not have African league live scores feature too. If you can do that then it would be nice.For your promotion and advertisement, you can contact Royse777 as he is well known and amongst the reputable managers we have here on this platform. He has vast knowledge and wealth of experience in project management. He would deliver for your project as his records speaks of great volume.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Welcome to the forum Where is the search list? It's not there do I have to scroll down the page to see the before and after match results?I'm still not familiar with the statistical analysis of your website but I'll try to understand by looking here more.So what is the benefit of logging in on this website? I tried logging in but there's nothing there except the Logout option again.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: I am using Flashscore website for years and it wont be easy to make me use anything else for tracking results.Your website is opening pages much slower for me, and there isnt any information for team players and injuries.Lot of improvement is needed but its not a bad idea to add betting with smart contracts.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: SportScore on August 28, 2023, 07:10:44 AMWe are working on Smart Contract sport booking for Ethereum/Bitcoin for instant bets + real time watch of the match! all this new features will be announced soon!and you all are welcome to the First! Blockchain Sport booking!Welcome to the forum mate. To be honest the features that site is currently providing can be found in all crypto casinos where sportsbetting is offered. Even they providing better facilities like Live stream and live scoreboard and real time updation of the odds. So why does people will need a site like this? Yes maybe if you offer something unique then definitely people will come to the site and use the features. But currently I feel there is no need of such a site.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: It would have been good if they included the rest of the sports but seeing it's not yet done, I think it will evolve into a gambling site one day or will promote a casino of its own. I'm guessing they are going to ask for a fee when it's all done when the site provides helpful data to its users. It's just for football for now. It needs to pull out more data from its sources. It'd be interesting if they had tutorials on how fans are going to make use of the data. Anyway welcome to bitcointalk.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on August 28, 2023, 10:56:29 PMI am using Flashscore website for years and it wont be easy to make me use anything else for tracking results.Your website is opening pages much slower for me, and there isnt any information for team players and injuries.Lot of improvement is needed but its not a bad idea to add betting with smart contracts.Same here, also been using FlashScore as long as I can remember and it would take a lot for me to change to another app.But will check this up OP

comments.author: Text
comments.body: I'm trying to sign in to your platform, but it seems like you don't have a sign-up or registration process other than signing in via a Google account. I hope you can also have a process to allow those who want to try your platform without preferring to use a Google account.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: First of all your welcome to the forum. Your site is good because it looks like LiveScore website for sports. When I click the link through the image and navigate the site, it is very nice and there are no too much things like LiveScore. And in the present as I checked the site almost all the games in the site are going on. Some of them are halftime, some just 2minutes ago, and some 44 minutes. And all the stats in the game are showing so if you don't want to watch it through hall, you can just use this site to monitor the match. Op but I have few questions about the site. As others said I also didn't see any button to click and register so how do you make money from this website because the way I look at it it is a free service you're rendering here for people to view the match score that is going on in the La Liga sport and others. So what is the reason for the ANNOUNCEMENT thread? Or do you want to launch a Campaign Thread?

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: This is a good alternative to flashscore and I like the thing that you an API for the mini animation for the match (not sure what it's called) but I've seen that you only covers football? Do you have any specific timeline when are you going to add other sports and probably E-sports as I think many of us here are also interested with other sports, this could be really handy to analyze some upcoming games or just to get information on a certain match.I can see that there's still a lot of things to be added (matches) but regarding the information that you needed such as matchup history, h2h and other information  are already present so I think that was really a good startP.S. I have a question regarding your airdrop, are you dropping your own token? (do you have own token?)
